column4: Is there some way to know how to edit konqueror4.7 to work like the kde3.5?
what exactly do you mean?
: in the old version of konqueror it could view photos in pop-ups and preview audio only with a mouse over the file
use dolphin, that's the file manager
konqueror actually uses dolphin to display the files etc, so even if you use konqueror, you _are_ using dolphin
just open dolphin and use the information panel, it shows previews and can play most audio files by default
Do you get the code to compile?
compile what?
that functionality does not exist, use the information panel
But existed.
in another piece of software, KDE 4.x has little to do with KDE 3.x
you don't just need to edit it, you'll need to rewrite it
DCOP no longer exists
I don't really use virtualbox, no
DCOP was used only in KDE3 applications, never in KDE 4.x
that has nothing to do with it using DCOP or not, it's something built-in to applications and no KDE 4.x application uses DCOP, they all use DBus
you may use it with KDE 3.x applications, but not with 4.x, this is not an opinion, this is a fact
that's because that version *is* KDE 3.x version, not the KDE 4.x version
I use the new version of KDE.Kubuntu oineric 11.10.
that has nothing to do with what version of kaffeine you are using, and 0.8.7 is the KDE 3.x version
it ported to KDE 4.x in 1.0
